settings.heading: AUTHENTICITY
settings.description: Sourced from our strong connections in the luxury fashion market.

settings.heading: CUSTOMER SERVICE
settings.description: We offer customers fast shipping, reliable tracking and a fair returns policy. Our team respond to all messages as quickly as we can.

settings.heading: INNOVATION
settings.description: Our marketplace is constantly evolving, as we endeavour to provide customers with the best shopping experience possible.

settings.heading: HOME TO ICONIC FASHION.
settings.description:
Basement 88 is the premier online marketplace to shop curated designer fashion for less.

We source authentic, unique and limited products often not available anywhere else, with price tags lower than high street retailers. Our deep connections with the luxury clothing market and our love for fashion means that we're always sourcing new designers and collections.

Our brand tenets are:

settings.heading: DO YOU OFFER FREE SHIPPING?
settings.description: Yes you can enjoy free shipping worldwide for purchases over $200.

settings.heading: DO YOU SHIP ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD?

settings.heading: WHAT IS YOUR RETURNS POLICY?
settings.description: You can learn more about our returns policy here.

settings.heading: HOW DO YOU GUARANTEE AUTHENTICITY?
settings.description: Products come with original tags and packaging. We work with only reputable suppliers in Europe - Every product also undergoes rigorous inspection before being sent out to our customers.

settings.heading: DO YOU HAVE AN AFFILIATE PROGRAM?
settings.description: Yes we have an affiliate program, you can learn more and join Basement 88 here.

settings.heading: DO YOU HAVE A PHYSICAL STORE?
settings.description: We are not selling at any physical locations just yet, but this is something to look out for in the future!

settings.heading: FROM RUNWAY TO STORE TO YOUR DOOR.
